ext_anim.h

00001 /* anim.h */
00002 
00003 #ifndef _EXT_ANIM_H_
00004 #define _EXT_ANIM_H_
00005 
00006 #include <Palettes.h>
00007 
00008 #define ANIM
00009 
00010 #ifdef ANIM
00011 
00012 typedef struct offscreen {
00013     t_object *o_ob;
00014     PixMapHandle offPix;
00015     Handle offMem;
00016     BitMap offBits;
00017     BitMap curBits;
00018     PixMapHandle curPix;
00019     Rect imageClip,screenRect;
00020     Rect temp;
00021     GrafPtr dest;
00022     Boolean realityChecked;
00023     RgnHandle saveVisRgn,wholeRgn,mRgn,invisRgn,visCopy;
00024     struct sprt *spriteList;
00025     struct sprt *lastSprite;        /* used eventually... */
00026 #ifdef _Offscreen_
00027     GWorldPtr world;
00028 #else
00029     Ptr world;
00030 #endif
00031     CGrafPtr savePort;
00032     GDHandle saveDevice;
00033 } OffScreen, t_offscreen;
00034 
00035 typedef struct colorinfo {
00036     short c_hasColorQD;
00037     short c_depth;
00038     short c_has32bitQD;
00039     short c_inColor;
00040     short c_curDevH;
00041     short c_curDevV;
00042 } CInfoRec, t_colorinfo;
00043 
00044 typedef struct gwind {
00045     t_object g_ob;
00046     t_wind *g_wind;
00047     short g_style;
00048     Point g_last;
00049     PaletteHandle g_palette;
00050     char g_inited;
00051     char g_mousein;             /* mouse in window flag */
00052     t_symbol *g_sym;        /* associated symbol (name) */
00053     t_object *g_assoc;      /* associated graphic object */
00054     t_offscreen *g_off;         /* offscreen buffer */
00055     struct gwind *g_next;       /* next graphics window in the list */
00056 } GWind, t_gwind;
00057 
00058 typedef struct sprite {
00059     t_object s_ob;
00060     GrafPtr s_dest;             /* screen dest */
00061     Rect s_rect;                /* rectangle */
00062     BitMapHandle s_mask;        /* mask */
00063     RgnHandle s_rgn;            /* mask rgn */
00064     short s_number;             /* sprite number (priority) */
00065     char s_drawn;               /* is it drawn */
00066     char s_change;              /* message to sprite proc to go to its "next" frame */
00067     method s_proc;          /* procedure that draws */
00068     long s_frame;               /* current frame, used by s_proc */
00069     long s_misc;                /* used by s_proc */
00070     void *s_assoc;              /* an associated object */
00071     t_offscreen *s_owner;           /* owning system */
00072     struct sprite *s_prev;      /* link */
00073     struct sprite *s_next;      /* link */
00074 } t_sprite;
00075 
00076 void gwind_offscreen(t_gwind *x);
00077 void *gwind_setport(t_gwind *x);
00078 t_gwind *gwind_get(t_symbol *s);
00079 t_offscreen *off_new(GrafPtr port);
00080 void off_free(t_offscreen *o);
00081 void off_maxrect(t_offscreen *o,Rect *a,Rect *b,Rect *maxRect);
00082 void off_copy(t_offscreen *o);
00083 void off_tooff(t_offscreen *o,PixMapHandle pm,Rect *src,Rect *dst);
00084 void off_size(t_offscreen *o);
00085 void off_copyrect(t_offscreen *o,Rect *r);
00086 t_sprite *sprite_new(void *assoc, t_offscreen *owner, long number, Rect *rect, method proc);
00087 void sprite_moveto(t_sprite *x, short h, short v);
00088 void sprite_move(t_sprite *x, short dh, short dv);
00089 void sprite_redraw(t_sprite *x, short dh, short dv, short frame, short next);
00090 void sprite_draw(t_sprite *x);
00091 void sprite_erase(t_sprite *x);
00092 void sprite_rect(t_sprite *x, Rect *newRect, short frame, short next);
00093 void sprite_newpriority(t_sprite *x, long newpri);
00094 
00095 #endif /* ANIM */
